title: Request Dorm Room Change
description: A student wants to request a room change due to an issue with their roommate.

tasks.description: Identify the student and their current room assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student's identity and location.

tasks.description: Explain the room change request process, including the requirement to first attempt mediation with the Resident Advisor (RA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the university's policy.

tasks.description: Provide the student with the contact information for their RA and the official room change request form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the student with the necessary resources to proceed.
